attributes.name: deepstallRegime
attributes.description: Whether or not a deep stall regime is to be used

attributes.name: upperTailAngle
attributes.description: Tail angle between a line perpendicular to the flow and the line from the tip of the wedge, low (negative) angles of attack

attributes.name: lowerTailAngle
attributes.description: As upper tail angle, but for high (positive) angles of attack

attributes.name: upperNoseAngle
attributes.description: Nose angle between a line perpendicular to the flow and the line from the tip of the wedge, low (negative) angles of attack

attributes.name: lowerNoseAngle
attributes.description: As upper nose angle, but for high (positive) angles of attack

attributes.name: noseRadiusRatio
attributes.description: The ratio of the nose radius to the chord of the airfoil.
